
## {{var0}}

```{r {{var0}}-line}
#| label: {{var0}}-line
#| fig-cap: "Line plot of frequency and year, by research field. "

column0 = "research_field"
aaa <- auto_plot_descr(dat1 = dat_descr, 
                          column0 = column0, 
                          other_cutoff = 0, 
                          title0 = "Plot of frequency and year, by research field")

knitr::include_graphics(path = here::here("output", paste0("line-", column0,".png")))
```
